channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Man suspected of shooting 2 Minnesota lawmakers charged with murder after surrendering to police
item.description: The man suspected of killing a Minnesota lawmaker and wounding another has been taken into custody, ending a nearly two-day search that put the entire state on edge.

item.title: Friends say Minnesota shooting suspect was deeply religious and conservative
A teenager with a job making burritos became a powerful Minnesota lawmaker who trained service dogs
